changelog:
- Help task standalone: 4x3 grid, full-monitor scan for help icons simultaneously (no focus switching)
- Help in Scheduler: focus-switch mode
- Scheduler includes all tasks: Gathering, Healing, Bounty, Zombie, Rally, Rewards, Help
- GUI Version toggle (top-left ⇄ button)
- Admin: Template Snapper tool
- Fix: client names with underscore/space now detected correctly
- Fix: healing claim retry (up to 3 retries, 1s interval) if claim doesn't register
